home.heroTitle: We support life, not the disease.
home.heroSubtitle: Ark'Anges supports people with cancer in their daily lives, so they can continue to live as normally as possible.
home.missionText: Ark'Anges is a Quebec association that supports people with cancer in their daily lives. We provide concrete financial and material assistance, organize cultural charity events, and inform to destigmatize cancer. Our approach is centered on life and dignity, more than on the disease.
home.action1Desc: Concrete support to offset loss of income and expenses related to the disease.
home.action2Desc: Groceries, wigs, post-mastectomy lingerie, and other essential needs.
home.action3Desc: Comedy shows, concerts and galas to bring people together and raise awareness.
home.event1Desc: A comedy show to bring people together, laugh together and raise awareness.

about.title: About Ark'Anges
about.subtitle: A Quebec association dedicated to human and concrete support
about.whoWeAreText1: Ark'Anges is a non-profit organization (NPO) in the process of being created in Quebec. Founded on the conviction that cancer does not define a person, our association supports people with cancer in their daily lives, providing them with concrete, human and respectful support of their dignity.
about.whoWeAreText2: We reject misery and medical imagery. Our approach is centered on life, beauty, culture and moments of sharing. We believe that laughing, singing, coming together and continuing to live normally are acts of resistance and healing.
about.missionText1: Support people with cancer in their daily lives by providing concrete financial and material assistance, organizing cultural charity events that bring people together and raise awareness, and informing to destigmatize cancer.
about.missionText2: Our goal is simple: to help people continue to live as normally as possible despite the physical, psychological, social and financial impacts of the disease.
about.visionText1: We aspire to a Quebec where people with cancer are supported with dignity and humanity, where the disease does not become an obstacle to a full and fulfilling life.
about.visionText2: We dream of a society that understands that cancer is an ordeal, but that it does not define who we are. A society that celebrates life, resilience and beauty, even in difficult times.
about.value1Desc: Every person deserves to be treated with respect and consideration, regardless of their health situation.
about.value2Desc: We favor a human approach, centered on life and relationships, never on pathology.
about.value3Desc: We commit concretely with tangible actions that make a real difference in daily life.
about.value4Desc: We believe in the strength of life and in everyone's ability to continue to live fully.
about.purposeText1: Cancer affects thousands of people in Quebec every year. Beyond medical challenges, people affected face considerable impacts on their daily lives: loss of income, additional expenses, fatigue, social isolation, and many others.
about.purposeText2: Ark'Anges exists to remind that these people are first and foremost human beings with dreams, passions, talents and a life to live. We exist to tell them: "You are not alone. We are here to support you, help you and help you continue to live, laugh, create and share."
about.quote: Cancer does not define a person. Ark'Anges supports life around.

actions.title: Our actions
actions.subtitle: Concrete actions for human and effective support
actions.intro: Ark'Anges intervenes at several levels to support people with cancer. Each action is designed to be concrete, useful and respectful of people's dignity. We always favor the human approach, centered on life and well-being.
actions.action1Desc: We provide concrete financial support to offset loss of income related to the disease. When a person is in treatment, they may be unable to work, which creates considerable financial pressure.
actions.action1Detail1: Partial compensation for loss of income
actions.action1Detail2: Assistance with transportation costs to treatment centers
actions.action1Detail3: Support for unexpected expenses related to the disease
actions.action2Desc: We offer vouchers to meet specific and concrete needs, allowing people to regain some normality in their daily lives.
actions.action3Desc: We collaborate with specialized partners who share our values and offer truly useful and human services to people with cancer.
actions.action4Desc: We inform the public about cancer in a positive way, focusing on life, resilience and solutions, rather than fear and disease.
actions.ctaTitle: Would you like to benefit from our support?
actions.ctaText: Contact us to learn more about our assistance programs and eligibility criteria.

events.title: Our events
events.subtitle: Moments of sharing, culture and generosity
events.intro: Ark'Anges events are designed to bring people together, raise awareness and raise funds, while celebrating life, culture and beauty. Each event is an opportunity to create moments of joy, sharing and hope, far from any misery approach.
events.event1Desc: A charity comedy show that brings people together, makes them laugh and raises awareness. Humor as an act of resistance and healing.
events.event1Objective: Bring the community together, raise awareness in a positive way, and raise funds for our assistance programs.
events.event1Ambiance: Warm, festive, full of laughter and good humor. A moment of shared joy.
events.event2Desc: A charity concert highlighting the beauty and strength of life through music. Talented artists come together for a common cause.
events.event2Objective: Celebrate life, beauty and resilience through musical art, while supporting our actions.
events.event2Ambiance: Elegant, moving, inspiring. An evening where music becomes a message of hope.
events.event3Title: The Gala of Hope and Glamour
events.event3Desc: A prestigious gala organized in partnership with La Maison de Patricia, combining elegance, glamour and generosity.
events.event3Objective: Organize a large-scale event to raise significant funds and raise awareness among a wide audience.
events.event3Ambiance: Sophisticated, glamorous, nocturnal. An evening where elegance meets generosity.
events.event4Desc: An Afro-Caribbean market dedicated to wellness and health, highlighting natural and cultural solutions for well-being.
events.event4Objective: Promote diverse and culturally relevant wellness approaches, while creating a space for meeting and exchange.
events.event4Ambiance: Lively, colorful, community-based. A space for discovery and sharing around wellness.
events.ctaText: Join us for moments of sharing, culture and generosity. Stay informed about our upcoming events by contacting us.

eventDetail.ctaText: Join us for this moment of sharing, culture and generosity. Contact us for more information or to register.

partners.title: Our partners
partners.subtitle: Strong alliances for real impact
partners.intro1: Ark'Anges partnerships are carefully selected. We only collaborate with organizations and companies that share our values: human approach, concrete solutions, ethical alignment, and focus on people's well-being.
partners.intro2: Each partnership is designed to be useful, human and aligned. We refuse purely commercial partnerships that do not really serve our beneficiaries. Our logic is simple: if it's not useful, human and aligned, it's not for us.
partners.kreokareDesc: Kréokare is a partner that shares our values of human and concrete support. Together, we work to offer truly useful solutions to people with cancer.
partners.kreokarePartnership: Our partnership with Kréokare is based on a shared vision: that of respectful, useful and aligned support with people's real needs. We collaborate to offer complementary services that enrich our assistance offer.
partners.patriciaDesc: La Maison de Patricia is a privileged partner with whom we organize large-scale events, including the Gala of Hope and Glamour.
partners.patriciaPartnership: Our collaboration with La Maison de Patricia perfectly illustrates our approach: combining elegance, culture and generosity to create memorable moments that raise awareness and raise funds. This partnership is based on a shared vision of support and assistance.
partners.becomePartnerText: Do you share our values and want to collaborate with Ark'Anges? We are open to partnerships that bring real added value to our beneficiaries, while respecting our ethical principles.

support.title: Support us
support.subtitle: Together, let's make a difference in the lives of people with cancer
support.intro: There are several ways to support Ark'Anges and contribute to our mission of supporting people with cancer. Each form of support is precious and helps create a real and concrete impact.
support.donateDesc: Your donation directly funds our financial and material assistance programs for people with cancer.
support.donateNote: Donations are essential to enable Ark'Anges to continue supporting people in need. Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a difference.
support.partnerDesc: Join us as a partner to create a lasting and significant impact.
support.partnerBenefit2: Association with a noble and human cause
support.partnerNote: We are looking for partners who share our values: human approach, concrete solutions, ethical alignment. Contact us to discuss partnership opportunities.
support.volunteerDesc: There are many ways to support Ark'Anges beyond financial donation.
support.volunteerNote: Your time, skills and commitment are just as valuable as financial donations. Together, we can make a difference.
support.donationFormText: Your generosity directly funds our assistance programs. For now, please contact us to make a donation.
support.donationNote: Note: The online payment system is not yet activated. Please contact us directly to make a donation. We are working on setting up a secure payment solution.
support.ctaText: Feel free to contact us to discuss the best way to support Ark'Anges. We are here to answer all your questions.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: We are here to listen and answer your questions
contact.intro: Would you like to know more about Ark'Anges? Do you have questions about our assistance programs? Do you want to support us or become a partner? Feel free to contact us. We will be happy to answer you and exchange with you.
contact.name: Full name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.infoNote: We generally respond within 48 hours. For urgent requests, please do not hesitate to call us directly.
